content.title: D'Tec Turnabout
content.subtitle: Where the reality of the diurnal was decided

text.p1: The town orator triggered the orb and from the inside materialized a little structure made of stone where he prepared a camp fire to light the plaza up. He took advantage of the flame for lighting a incense bar and started his sermon.

tooltip.orb: Contenedor capaz de albergar objetos compuestos de materia inorganica de cualquier tama√±o
